page.title: 10Lea Nurseries. Moor Hall.
page.content: Used to be farms but are now not.The nearest shops are at Cottom. {Lea Nurseries} is approximately 50 years old.The owner says he enjoys his work, although he doesn't get many customers. He likes the area except for the buildings which have recently been constructed.The nurseries cover 3\4 acres,which the owner says is just enough. {Moor Hall} was built during the 17th century.The owners,along with the house,own about 65 acres of land. However,they do not farm the land,but {rent the land} to neighbouring farms. Again,the owners like the area,but are not keen on the new buildings.On the land surrounding the farmhouse,{hens, cows and bulls} are to be found.The fields around are given up to the growing of grass.
